original_text: And you shall say to the people of Israel, ‘This shall be my holy anointing oil throughout your generations.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르기를 이것은 너희 대대로 내게 거룩한 관유니

sentences.original_text: And you shall say to the people of Israel
‘This shall be my holy anointing oil
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 나의 거룩한 관유가 될 것이니
